name: Sephirothic Stories
description: When the world tree begins to wane, what will become of the balance of the world? Discover the truth behind the world tree's waning power in a fantasy RPG! Navigate trap-filled dungeons using only your mind and wit to conquer challenging puzzles!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 and up Processor: Intel® Core™ i5 Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: 4GB VRAM Storage: 600 MB available space
